description: Permutation of N: a(1)=2, a(2)=1 and for each k >= 2, let p(k)=least natural number not already an a(i), q(k)=p(k)+k-1, a(2k-1)=q(k), a(2k)=p(k).
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
crossrefs: Odd-indexed terms: A026356. Even-indexed terms: A026355. Inverse permutation: A064579.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
